gw.api.admin

Interface PublicZoneFinder


  • public interface PublicZoneFinder
    Finder for zones.
    Author:
    ahuynh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findAdminZones()
      Find all admin zones.
      java.util.Set<Country> findLoadedCountries()
      Find countries with zone datas.
      Zone findZone(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneCode)
      Finds the zone that belongs to the specified country and is of the specified type and zoneCode.
      Zone findZone(com.guidewire.pl.domain.geodata.zone.ZoneKey key)
      Finds the zone that belongs to the specified key, if the key is invalid it will just return null.
      java.lang.String[] findZoneCodes(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, Zone linkedZone)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
      Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type and zone code.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, java.lang.String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType)
      Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, java.lang.String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneNameStartsWith)
      Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByCode(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneCode, boolean startsWith) 
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country country, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneName, boolean startsWith)
      Find all zones that are linked to zones that match the criteria of (country, zoneType, zoneName)
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, java.lang.String linkedZoneName, ZoneType zoneType)
      Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry, ZoneType linkedZoneType, java.lang.String linkedZoneName, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneNameStartsWith)
      Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith.
      IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesInAllCountries(ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
      Find all zones that have the specified zone type and zone code.
      boolean hasLink(Country country, ZoneType linkedZoneType, java.lang.String linkedZoneCode, ZoneType zoneType, java.lang.String zoneCode)
      Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith.

    • Method Detail

      • findAdminZones

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findAdminZones()
        Find all admin zones.
        Returns:
        all the zones that are admin zones

      • findLoadedCountries

        java.util.Set<Country> findLoadedCountries()
        Find countries with zone datas.
        Returns:
        all the Countries that had zone data in the database

      • findZone

        Zone findZone(Country country,
              ZoneType zoneType,
              java.lang.String zoneCode)
        Finds the zone that belongs to the specified country and is of the specified type and zoneCode. There should be 0 or 1. If there is more than one, there will be an exception thrown.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneCode - the zonecode @return the zone
        Returns:
        the zone if found, null otherwise

      • findZone

        Zone findZone(com.guidewire.pl.domain.geodata.zone.ZoneKey key)
        Finds the zone that belongs to the specified key, if the key is invalid it will just return null. There should be 0 or 1. If there is more than one, there will be an exception thrown.
        Parameters:
        key - the zonekey
        Returns:
        the zone if key is valid and found

      • findZoneCodes

        java.lang.String[] findZoneCodes(Country country,
                                 ZoneType zoneType,
                                 Zone linkedZone)
        Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        linkedZone - the returned zone codes are linked to this zone, can be null.
        Returns:
        an array of zone codes

      • findZones

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country,
                                 ZoneType zoneType,
                                 java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
        Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type and zone code. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneCodes - the zone codes
        Returns:
        all the zones that match the zone codes

      • findZonesInAllCountries

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesInAllCountries(ZoneType zoneType,
                                               java.lang.String[] zoneCodes)
        Find all zones that have the specified zone type and zone code. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneCodes - the zone codes
        Returns:
        all the zones that match the zone codes

      • findZonesByName

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country country,
                                       ZoneType zoneType,
                                       java.lang.String zoneName,
                                       boolean startsWith)
        Find all zones that are linked to zones that match the criteria of (country, zoneType, zoneName)
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneName - the zone name
        startsWith - if true, the match on zone name is a partial match, otherwise, it is an exact match.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor of Zone entities ordered by zone name

      • findZonesByCode

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByCode(Country country,
                                       ZoneType zoneType,
                                       java.lang.String zoneCode,
                                       boolean startsWith)
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        zoneCode - the zone code
        startsWith - if true, the match on zone code is a partial match, otherwise, it is an exact match.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor of Zone entities ordered by zone code

      • findZones

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country country,
                                 ZoneType zoneType)
        Find all zones that are part of the given country and have the specified zone type. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        country - the country
        zoneType - the zone type
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code

      • findZones

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry,
                                 ZoneType linkedZoneType,
                                 java.lang.String linkedZoneCode,
                                 ZoneType zoneType)
        Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.
        Parameters:
        linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
        zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

      • findZonesByName

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry,
                                       ZoneType linkedZoneType,
                                       java.lang.String linkedZoneName,
                                       ZoneType zoneType)
        Finds zones that are linked to the zone specified by (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType.
        Parameters:
        linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneName - the zone name, cannot be null.
        zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

      • findZones

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZones(Country linkedCountry,
                                 ZoneType linkedZoneType,
                                 java.lang.String linkedZoneCode,
                                 ZoneType zoneType,
                                 java.lang.String zoneNameStartsWith)
        Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
        zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
        zoneNameStartsWith - the returned zones' names start with this value; this can be null in which case there is no restriction on the returned zones' names
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

      • findZonesByName

        IQueryBeanResult<Zone> findZonesByName(Country linkedCountry,
                                       ZoneType linkedZoneType,
                                       java.lang.String linkedZoneName,
                                       ZoneType zoneType,
                                       java.lang.String zoneNameStartsWith)
        Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        linkedCountry - the linkedCountry, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneName - the zone name, cannot be null.
        zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
        zoneNameStartsWith - the returned zones' names start with this value; this can be null in which case there is no restriction on the returned zones' names
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.

      • hasLink

        boolean hasLink(Country country,
                ZoneType linkedZoneType,
                java.lang.String linkedZoneCode,
                ZoneType zoneType,
                java.lang.String zoneCode)
        Finds zones that are linked to the specified zone (linkedCountry, linkedZoneType, linkedZoneCode) and are of type zoneType and whose name starts with zoneNameStartsWith. The zones returned are ordered by zone code.
        Parameters:
        country - the country for determining the link.
        linkedZoneType - the zone type, cannot be null.
        linkedZoneCode - the zone code, cannot be null.
        zoneType - the returned zones are of this type, can be null.
        zoneCode - the returned zone codes are of this type, can be null.
        Returns:
        QueryProcessor of Zone entities, ordered by zone code.
